caller_intent: Lori Collins wanted to make a payment on her car insurance policy and update her email address due to a recent phone hack.
resolution_steps: Confirmed name on card matched Lori Collins.
Updated email address to 'Lawson.Lori@Protonmail' due to security changes.
summary: Lori Collins successfully made a car insurance payment while updating her email address to a Protonmail account due to security concerns. The agent processed the payment, verified details, and sent a receipt via the new email. Lori confirmed no further assistance was needed.
